Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 69th overall pick, by Oakland in 2010...
Traded from Oakland to Cincinnati on 2/8/2011 (Going to OAK: RF H. Pence, 3B A. Callaspo, P V. Pestano. Going to CIN: C T. d'Arnaud, SS C. Colon, CF T. Nixon)...
Traded from Cincinnati to New York (N) on 2/8/2013 (Going to CIN: 3B A. Rodriguez. Going to NYN: 2B C. Colon, P J. Outman, P D. Price, P A. Llorent)...
Had first career hit on 4/11/2014, off Brad Voyles (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2014, off Jesus Colome (SDN)...
Injured on 9/23/2015 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Washington on 4/1/2016 (Going to NYN: SS J. Giavotella. Going to WSH: 2B C. Colon, SS J. Ortiz)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2017, hitting .429 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Traded from Washington to New York (A) on 4/12/2019 (Going to WSH: 2B K. Wong, P W. Clark Jr., RF B. Sieben. Going to NYA: 2B C. Colon)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/2/2019, hitting .407 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2020, hitting .416 with 12 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/2/2020, hitting .538 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2020, hitting .329 with 49 HR, 145 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 6/6/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Toronto on 7/25/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/26/2021, hitting .519 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2021, hitting .365 with 12 HR, 31 RBI...
Won Most Valuable Player Award in 2021, hitting .315 with 52 HR, 153 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/26/2022, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 5/25/2022...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 7/7/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/12/2022, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 7/20/2022...
